title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XVIII, pt. 410 - External Appeals Of Adverse Determinations Of Health Care Plans
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XVIII, pt. 410

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1109, 3201, 3216, 3217, 3217-a, 3221, 4235, 4303, 4304, 4305, 4321, 4322, 4324; arts. 47, 49; L. 1998, ch. 586

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
